install.name: System - Peoplesign photo captcha
install.author: Ersin Buckley
install.description: Easily add a Peoplesign captcha to the following Joomla forms: contact us, registration and more. You must enable this plugin from Extensions->Plugin Manager

param.name: peoplesignKey
param.label:
Registration Key
(Get a new key here. The default key will
eventually expire.)
param.description: Free support and extra features are available if your register and use your own key.

param.name: peoplesignConfigurationString
param.label:
Customization String
(Get it here)
param.description: Allows you to customize the appearance and security level of Peoplesign.

param.name: enableForCom_Contact
param.label: Add Peoplesign to <u>Contact Us </u>form?
param.description: This may not work if you customized this form (via manual edit or template override).

param.name: enableForLogin
param.label: Add Peoplesign to <u>Login</u> form (on the component page)?
param.description: This may not work if you customized this form (via manual edit or template override).

param.name: enableForRegister
param.label: Add Peoplesign to the default <u>Registration</u> form?
param.description: This may not work if you customized this form (via manual edit or template override).

param.name: enableForReset
param.label: Add Peoplesign to <u>Reset Password</u> form?
param.description: This may not work if you customized this form (via manual edit or template override).

param.name: enableForRemind
param.label: Add Peoplesign to <u>Remind Username</u> form?
param.description: This may not work if you customized this form (via manual edit or template override).

param.name: enableForKunena
param.label: Add Peoplesign to <u>Kunena</u> anonymous forms
param.description: This may not work if you customized this form (via manual edit or template override).
